snippet.textDisplay: Looks good for a quickie mask.  I tried that, didn't work out very well since I have a big head.  Rubber bands were tough on the ears, too.  I got the old sewing machine out and made one in about 1 hour, then a few extras in about 10 minutes each.  Made them from cut-up pillowcase fabric (its soft) and elastic cord cut to fit the mask (and me).
snippet.textOriginal: Looks good for a quickie mask.  I tried that, didn't work out very well since I have a big head.  Rubber bands were tough on the ears, too.  I got the old sewing machine out and made one in about 1 hour, then a few extras in about 10 minutes each.  Made them from cut-up pillowcase fabric (its soft) and elastic cord cut to fit the mask (and me).

snippet.textDisplay: This is such an awesome way to get a mask in a pinch. Now, since I heard that the cotton material will not protect against COVID-19, so I placed a cut pice of heap filter in the middle to ensure proper protection. It's slightly harder to breathe but you get used to it. I also added a pipe cleaner to the top so I could pinch it down around my nose. Such an awesome way to help ensure safety.
snippet.textOriginal: This is such an awesome way to get a mask in a pinch. Now, since I heard that the cotton material will not protect against COVID-19, so I placed a cut pice of heap filter in the middle to ensure proper protection. It's slightly harder to breathe but you get used to it. I also added a pipe cleaner to the top so I could pinch it down around my nose. Such an awesome way to help ensure safety.

snippet.textDisplay:
With the COVID-19 virus claiming many lives have you come to the understanding that human life is frail. Tomorrow is not guaranteed to anyone, people die every day young and old and it's a fact that each one of us will have to face death one day. 10 out of 10 people will die that said have you thought about where you will spend eternity once you pass from this life? Do you have any thoughts on the afterlife? 

---

God is perfect and Holy and He requires nothing less than His own perfection. But, we are not able to attain His holiness. He doesn't lie, cheat, or steal, but we do these things. Therefore, there's a judgment upon us because we have broken the Law of God, we have sinned by lying and cheating and stealing. This judgment is eternal damnation. However, God the Father loves us so much that He sent God the Son, Jesus, who died on the cross as a sacrifice to pay the penalty for our sins. He died on the cross and physically rose from the dead three days later. This proves that His sacrifice was acceptable to the Father. Therefore, if you want to receive what Jesus has done to remove the wrath of God the Father, then you must receive Him and His sacrifice by faith. If you want forgiveness for your sins against God. 




Romans 3:23 For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God; 

(Everyone has fallen short of God's glory, you must be morally perfect which means never sinned in your whole life; we all fail miserably if we are honest with ourselves)




Romans 3:10 As it is written, There is none righteous, no, not one: 

(No one is a good person we all have told a lie before or been angry or took God's name in vain etc. These are all sins)




Romans 5:12 Wherefore, as by one man sin entered into the world, and death by sin; and so death passed upon all men, for that all have sinned: 

(You and I were born in sin because of Adam's transgression which made us all sinners by nature)




Romans 6:23 For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord. 

(God will pay all sinners what they deserve which is death, but the good news (gospel) is that God made a way for you to escape the judgement through Christ)




Romans 1:20 For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen, being understood by the things that are made, even his eternal power and Godhead; so that they are without excuse: 

(All of creation testifies that God is real therefore no one will have an excuse ex. "what if I never heard the gospel")




Romans 5:8 But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us. 

(The good news is that Jesus Christ paid it all in full, you can be saved by placing your faith in Jesus Christ in His death, burial and resurrection)




Romans 10:9-10, 13 That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead, thou shalt be saved. For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation. ... For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved. 

(Will you confess Jesus Christ? Will you believe in Him?)




Romans 5:1 Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ: 

(If you do you can be justified with God made righteous through Jesus Christ and you'll have peace with God.)




Romans 8:1, 38-39 There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit. ... For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come, Nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord. 

(Last but not least you'll never lose your salvation because it's a free gift which no one will be able to take away; and you'll have a home in heaven.)

snippet.textDisplay:
I dint know why you couldn't cut up a filter, say one for the home a/c and insert it into the bandana or fabric.
Make sure to use caution removing the mask or fabric and wash hands/change gloves afterwards. If the virus is on the outside of your mask you could easily spread it around or catch it yourself if you're not careful enough.
Alcohol spray that is 60-70% is much more effective than 100% alcohol. Also, ethanol alcohol is even better than rubbing alcohol. Check out the CDC website for complete details. It's really quite interesting.
snippet.textOriginal:

Alcohol spray that is 60-70% is much more effective than 100% alcohol. Also, ethanol alcohol is even better than rubbing alcohol. Check out the CDC website for complete details. It's really quite interesting.

snippet.textDisplay: I hope you dont mind o shared on twitter. This was the most helpful of all the diy videos I watched. I did add a coffee filter to mine for extra filtering goodness. I am an RN and wanted a mask for going out for necessities, but wouldn't pinch one from work when that is where they are really needed most. I think everybody should cover their mouths these days when in public, but medical grade equipment is not necessary for a grocery run. Thank you for teaching this!!
snippet.textOriginal: I hope you dont mind o shared on twitter. This was the most helpful of all the diy videos I watched. I did add a coffee filter to mine for extra filtering goodness. I am an RN and wanted a mask for going out for necessities, but wouldn't pinch one from work when that is where they are really needed most. I think everybody should cover their mouths these days when in public, but medical grade equipment is not necessary for a grocery run. Thank you for teaching this!!

snippet.textDisplay: When you fold the bandana to the center twice, you are leaving the center of the fabric as one layer think only. This affords no protection whatsoever. Sure it looks great with all those pleats, however the center, where your nose and mouth bring in and exhale air, is one layer allowing this 0.2 to 0.05 micron Covid19 virus to enter and exit easily. Anyone who wears this can and will get infected if exposed to air with covid in it. I find it insulting the Surgeon General has a video with this same design and that people in America just accept this as "good enough." In early January when I saw what was happening in China, then spreading to Korea and Japan I went out and bought  a couple boxes of N95 masks to keep my family safe. I decided not to buy more or hoard, but get what I thought would be good enough - 40 masks, allowing the use of 1 mask per week for 40 weeks if this in fact landed on our soil. I also bought a box of rubber gloves, and some Tyvek 40 suits with hoods and booties. Since this time I gave one box of N95 masks to a friend who is a respiratory therapist. Now the government tells the public not to wear N95 masks, and to only where useless cloth face coverings. The Government was not prepared, and did not react as I did when little ole me saw this coming, now they tell citizens to go out with a lousy face covering and put ourselves at risk because they do not have what our medical profession needs. I will wear my tyvek hooded suit, rubber gloves, N95 mask and goggles when I take delivery of groceries and sanitize them for my 86 year old mother, to replenish her pantry. I will not 'save' my N95 masks for nurses putting my 86 year old mother in harms way because I'm breathing possible covid germs thru a single layer of cutely pleated fabric, onto her food I bring her. The Government of the Greatest Country in the history of the World should have been better prepared, and should NOT tell citizens to be stupid and not use the material we have. I guarantee if I infect my 86 year old mother,  the doctors and nurses will use more than the 20 N95 masks I have. So, in fact by having prepared when I should have in January, as I did, I'm helping the medical profession by keeping my family home safe. I cna use 1 mask per week for 20 weeks, or 1 mask biweekly for the next 40 weeks and hopefully, stay safe and healthy. Now, if America would smarten up and keep 3 to 4 months of non perishable, frozen and long term food storage on hand, as well as PPE when it becomes available as we do, they wouldn't have had the mad dash on the stores as has happened recently. Prepare for the next wave of this, it's coming until there is a vaccine - just buy a little a week to store up, don't hoard buy. We haven't had the need to go to the store in March, nor will we in April. And, our vegetables are planted inside ready to go out soon - 30 days to fresh lettuce here, followed by other plants.  Smarten up America, and be safe. And please all you "helpful" people making non scientific videos that are putting people in harms way through false security as this video does, STOP. At least add three or 4 paper towels or coffee filters inside the folds of the mask if this is all you can do.

Sure it looks great with all those pleats, however the center, where your nose and mouth bring in and exhale air, is one layer allowing this 0.2 to 0.05 micron Covid19 virus to enter and exit easily. Anyone who wears this can and will get infected if exposed to air with covid in it. I find it insulting the Surgeon General has a video with this same design and that people in America just accept this as "good enough." In early January when I saw what was happening in China, then spreading to Korea and Japan I went out and bought  a couple boxes of N95 masks to keep my family safe. I decided not to buy more or hoard, but get what I thought would be good enough - 40 masks, allowing the use of 1 mask per week for 40 weeks if this in fact landed on our soil. I also bought a box of rubber gloves, and some Tyvek 40 suits with hoods and booties. Since this time I gave one box of N95 masks to a friend who is a respiratory therapist. Now the government tells the public not to wear N95 masks, and to only where useless cloth face coverings. The Government was not prepared, and did not react as I did when little ole me saw this coming, now they tell citizens to go out with a lousy face covering and put ourselves at risk because they do not have what our medical profession needs. I will wear my tyvek hooded suit, rubber gloves, N95 mask and goggles when I take delivery of groceries and sanitize them for my 86 year old mother, to replenish her pantry. I will not 'save' my N95 masks for nurses putting my 86 year old mother in harms way because I'm breathing possible covid germs thru a single layer of cutely pleated fabric, onto her food I bring her. The Government of the Greatest Country in the history of the World should have been better prepared, and should NOT tell citizens to be stupid and not use the material we have. I guarantee if I infect my 86 year old mother,  the doctors and nurses will use more than the 20 N95 masks I have. So, in fact by having prepared when I should have in January, as I did, I'm helping the medical profession by keeping my family home safe. I cna use 1 mask per week for 20 weeks, or 1 mask biweekly for the next 40 weeks and hopefully, stay safe and healthy. Now, if America would smarten up and keep 3 to 4 months of non perishable, frozen and long term food storage on hand, as well as PPE when it becomes available as we do, they wouldn't have had the mad dash on the stores as has happened recently. Prepare for the next wave of this, it's coming until there is a vaccine - just buy a little a week to store up, don't hoard buy. We haven't had the need to go to the store in March, nor will we in April. And, our vegetables are planted inside ready to go out soon - 30 days to fresh lettuce here, followed by other plants.  Smarten up America, and be safe. And please all you "helpful" people making non scientific videos that are putting people in harms way through false security as this video does, STOP. At least add three or 4 paper towels or coffee filters inside the folds of the mask if this is all you can do.

snippet.textDisplay: I tore a sheet, 22 x 22.  Folded as instructed, pressed the folds and used hairbands instead of rubber bands.  I added 2 pressed layers of coffee filter, cut to shape.  I now have 2 pretty purple masks.  I'm all set because this tutorial worked great.  Thank you for sharing it.
snippet.textOriginal: I tore a sheet, 22 x 22.  Folded as instructed, pressed the folds and used hairbands instead of rubber bands.  I added 2 pressed layers of coffee filter, cut to shape.  I now have 2 pretty purple masks.  I'm all set because this tutorial worked great.  Thank you for sharing it.
